website_summaries.verdict: High-quality parachute at a low price with a carrying bag for storage.
pros: Pack-style carrying bag makes it easy to take on the go
cons: Parachute is not quite 12 feet in diameter and has fewer handles than some of the same size

customer_reviews.title: This was so much fun for our family on Thanksgiving Day
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun for our family on Thanksgiving Day. We used it indoors and out and the adults and children used it with large beach-type balls and with smaller balls. One of the children had played with one at school and had many suggestions for how to play with it. Great purchase. Seems like it will last, easy to store back in the original bag that has back pack style string attached. Handles are sturdy and well attached.
customer_reviews.author: momsinger

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a strapping young family
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece for her birthday, and even though it was a rainy day and therefore no place to use it immediately, the parents and adults in the room gave squeals of delight, knowing how much fun it will be. I included some cotton balls and strings of yarn for the "popcorn" and "Poison Snakes ideas on your list (which I printed for them) of 188 fun things to do with the parachute. They have been forwarded this request as well in case there are more comments from the users themselves. Thanks for offering your product!
customer_reviews.author: G. Auld

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be pretty durable!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty durable. Strong straps so far. Vibrant colors. The only thing I would have liked it the material to be a little softer like a parachute. This is not true authentic parachute material.
customer_reviews.author: LTLRowell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect would definitely recommend.! It is exactly how it was advertised. well made, seems held together after some pretty rough use. The Parachute is bright and colorful. It has a nice red bag. I have many fond memories I bought this for my 6 year old son The handles are sturdy and the product was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Sollo Team

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that we have not actually used this yet. However, after taking it out and checking it out, it seems to be just as advertised. We are very excited about using it at our family reunion! It is of very good quality and the bonus list of ideas and activities is wonderful! We are very excited to put this to good use with our grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: sliver

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I took this parachute to Uganda and we used it in a few PE classes. After half a day, the stitching was undone in three different places. The plastic is very thin, which isn’t necessarily a bad thing. Definitely not for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly got a hole
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used the parachute twice for 2 - 15 minute indoor recesses. It already has a hole. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Worked great First time out
customer_reviews.text: Worked great First time out! Looked Great- was sturdy! We do kids parties and we need good stuff! Creative Parties For Kids endorses you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Karen Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a group of 4
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is perfect for my son's group of homeschool kids. We go to the park and do the classic parachute stuff I did as a kid in elementary school. There's enough handles for more but we only use it for a group of 4. Well made and the carry pack is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Adam I.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality play parachute. It has stood up to 4 kids and 2 adults playing all at once without ripping or tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely would recommend. My family loves it very colorful and durable an its played with by atleast 10 kids on a regular basis an its held up
customer_reviews.author: amanda stapleton

customer_reviews.title: The parachute is perfect. The kids love it and it is so ...
customer_reviews.text: The parachute is perfect. The kids love it and it is so easy for them to grip. I use it with my children's yoga classes and it is a BIG hit. Good quality and beautiful colors...not faded like some others I have purchased. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L Russo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home play!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids for Christmas, ages 15, 13, 11, 7 & 5. They loved it. My husband and I had fun playing with them as well. Perfect size for our needs. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric quality loops. Wish it had a book with it
customer_reviews.text: Bag that is for storage needs to be a little bigger so you have a chance to actually put back in it. I’d suggest adding a book of games. Be aware of size when you’re looking at this. Check your inches. Nice fabric, quality loops
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Turtle

customer_reviews.title: great medium sized prop
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Toddler Ballet classes. It is just big enough for these little people to have a great time. And it fits in the dance studio nicely. I can also travel with it to classrooms. It always fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this parachute!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for kids to play with at our reunion. It was a huge hit!! The handles seem sturdy, & the parachute colors couldn't be brighter!! The kids' parents enjoyed it as much as their children did. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Kids had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: We put the emoji blow up balls on the parachute game and the balls went high and the kids tried catching them in the parachute when they came down.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Better material would be needed.
customer_reviews.text: very very cheap material, but will be fun while it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: You can use the game suggestions or make up your own. Provided a lot of fun at a 6 year old's party.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters loved the parachute given as a birthday gift. Well constructed and exactly as expected. The colors are bright and the handles positioned appropriately around the edge. My only criticism is the storage bag could be bigger and the item could include some games and fun suggestions. I would recommend this item to others. Great price for this quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sign of any wear even though he can be pretty rough with it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality. My son loves it and he uses it almost daily after getting it 3 weeks ago. So sign of any wear even though he can be pretty rough with it. Every kid should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wicker

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 year old nieces and nephews but it looks sturdy. The vendor sends your a PDF of parachute ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it with the 2 year old nieces and nephews but it looks sturdy. The vendor sends your a PDF of parachute games after purchase. Nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made and perfect size for what we need!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this parachute for church activities! So far we have only used it once for VBS and the kids seemed to love it! It survived round one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! It shows up in the small red bag, so at first we thought it was going to be cheap and a waste of money. After we pulled it out we were very satisfied with the quality. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: nathan a spence

customer_reviews.title: Great quality parachute
customer_reviews.text: Great quality parachute. Would definitely purchase again. The bag it came with was a little too small to put back in once we played with it so I tossed it but it is extremely well made. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bramblet

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift - in use 10 minutes after gifts were open
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift to a 4 year old and it was in use by all the children at the party soon after being opened. They looked like they were having a great time!
customer_reviews.author: ri02842

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Was my sons favorite game in elementary school. He now has twin boys, and they love playing with it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product for a smaller group of kids
customer_reviews.text: It is well constructed and reinforced at the handles. It folds easily into the carrying bag. My Cub Scouts will have a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pony

customer_reviews.title: Kids love parachutes!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 1 year olds absolutely love this! Great durability and a lot of fun out of $12
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The material looks good, I wish the material is a little thicker
customer_reviews.text: We got our parachute yesterday. Looking forward on using it on our next birthday party! The material looks good, I wish the material is a little thicker. It's great it comes with a little bag. I will update my review after we use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. AG

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this product!!! It is beautiful and appears to be well made. Our kids at VBS loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great! The stitches are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The colors are great! The stitches are perfect, and all the lines are straight! The six of us including our dog played games with this parachute, and she, the dog, was pulling the handles of the parachute as dogs usually do that. So I thought the material will be finally torn apart. But it survived intact! And plus VOMLine's logo looks nice. Having bought the parachute I made the right choice!
customer_reviews.author: Evghenii Pisarenco

customer_reviews.title: Its the perfect size, and colors are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's 10th Birthday Party was great. His favorite was the parachute games. All the kids and adults enjoyed the parachute games.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for team building in fun way
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to use with a group or family for team effort in a fun way. Great ideas I liked from the pdf from the seller of this product
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with the kids!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my grandson's 1st birthday party - kids from all ages. The kids LOVED it! The colors are vibrant, not dull like some of the others I saw that cost less. Seems to be well made and easy to clean. Can be used outside or indoors, if you have the space. Love that it has it's on little bag for storage. Very happy with this purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, unique family gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun for a small group of people- kids and adults! Add a few balls for even more fun. Can also be used to make an easy "fort" by draping it over a table! Good quality/ value.
customer_reviews.author: D Pierce

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: HUGE, much too large for most indoor use, but a very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this parachute to a children's program in an underprivileged area, so it has not yet been used. It appears to be well-made. I will have to update this review after the children actually use the parachute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and in one piece! We haven't had a chance to use it yet as it is a Christmas gift, but we are excited!
customer_reviews.author: Alese Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The class of children enjoy using the parachute. It is difficult to get back in the bag it came in after we use it. It is a good purchase for the reason we wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Penfold

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value!
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is exactly as promised. I like the bright colors and it is sturdy. I found the very long list of suggested games very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, the handles are nice and sturdy. 2 or 3 people can easily make a fun game of it. It is a little difficult to get back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: PrimerMembers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! the kids have a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: JaMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Although I have not had a chance to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not had a chance to use the parachute, I do appreciate having the handles that can be wiped down, and the fact that the colors are fade resistant. Having a book with idea suggestions on its' use would be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Stood up to the "yanking" all day
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a field day with elementary students. Lots of fun. Stood up to the "yanking" all day! Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it and so do the kids. It is durable and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Brandylee Cox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product ,very good customer service,fast shipping!It worth tha money.
customer_reviews.author: ALOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and perfect size for personal use at bday ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and perfect size for personal use at bday parties and such. Might be a bit small for school use or larger groups.
customer_reviews.author: Wibke Kupfernagel

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Git this for my daughter's birthday party. Kids loved it! They had so much fun with it. The backpack is something extra and makes it easy to put the parachute away neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers up to 6 or 7 years
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Great for toddlers up to 6 or 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mollicone

customer_reviews.title: This parachute is perfect. It was a birthday gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is perfect. It was a birthday gift for my granddaughter. Well made and exactly as described. I would purchase again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Looks like sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly. Looks like sturdy construction. Can't wait to have fun with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: Childhood fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and a big hit at my son’s birthday party !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but was great for 2-5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my nephew. It wasn't the same material that i remember as a kid, but was great for 2-5 year olds. I'm considering on purchasing one for my child as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described we are going to have fun with this whoop whoop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and huge fun
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and large parachute! My therapy kids love it ☺️☺️☺️
customer_reviews.author: Jozsefne K.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be well-sewn with no loose strings or anything like that - good quality control
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. It seems to be well-sewn with no loose strings or anything like that - good quality control .Good quality material and the colors are beautiful . Nice and sturdy, great handles! folds easy in its own bag, and a good fair price! I like that it came with a backpack to store the parachute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Holding up to the play or abuse of sixteen nine year olds. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great! Product is just like the description says
customer_reviews.text: Really great ! Product is just like the description says . Really recommend this !!
customer_reviews.author: Raul Sustaita

customer_reviews.title: It was much bigger than I expected (which is a good thing) and the colors are quite vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the quality of this parachute when it came. It was much bigger than I expected (which is a good thing) and the colors are quite vibrant. The only thing that I would "fix" would be the fact that is does not lay flat. It bunches slightly in the middle when spread on the floor. Other than that small assessment, It is a wonderful addition to my dance class.
customer_reviews.author: Warkenda
